description: This Dart source file defines data models and enumerations for user preference filtering in a Flutter app. It includes enums for categorical options like hair color, race, and religion, as well as immutable classes for range handling and composite filter criteria, along with serialization/deserialization methods.

classes.name: Range
classes.description: A generic immutable class representing a numeric range with minimum and maximum bounds.

classes.name: FilterCriteria
classes.description: An immutable class encapsulating user preference filtering criteria, including sets of categorical options and numeric ranges.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new FilterCriteria with selectively overridden properties.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes the FilterCriteria object into a JSON-compatible map, converting enum sets into strings.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Deserializes a JSON map into a FilterCriteria instance, with fallback to defaults on errors.

methods.name: toJsonString
methods.description: Converts the FilterCriteria into a compact JSON string.

methods.name: tryFromJsonString
methods.description: Attempts to parse a JSON string into a FilterCriteria instance, returning null on failure.
